section_title: KAZAKHSTAN S PROPOSAL TO AMEND THE PROTOCOL:
sentences: On Wednesday, 1 December, the Secretariat introduced document FCCC/KP/CMP/2010/4, which relates to a proposal by Kazakhstan to amend the Kyoto Protocol to include Kazakhstan in Annex B.
Informal consultations were facilitated by Mark Berman (Canada).
Kazakhstan highlighted national efforts for transition to a low-carbon economy and development of a legal framework for a domestic cap-and-trade mechanism.
The Russian Federation, opposed by the Seychelles, for AOSIS, supported Kazakhstan s proposal.
The group met numerous times during the meeting.
On Friday, 10 December the COP/MOP adopted a decision.
